name: Riccardo Bartola
subtitle: Chief Marketing Officer
experiences:
I'm in charge of  the marketing activities both for Corporate (Cogetech) and our B2C Brand (iZiplay). I'm responsible for facilitating growth, sales and marketing strategy and for the coordination of the marketing departments (6 people) across Rome and Milan. I have substantially improved my managing and negotiating skills even in sponsorship activities at the highest level.
I have also worked to establish a brand-new marketing and communication department. 
I'm still working to reinforce the company culture in a changing organization. Direct report to CEO.
